low.title: Self‑reliance, amplified
low.body: You’re strong on self‑reliance. Flourishing grows when strength meets connection. Research suggests interdependence supports resilience and joy.
low.cta: Do one small generous act this week.

mid.title: Tend your support system
mid.body: You balance independence with connection. Relationships thrive with small, intentional care.

high.title: Builder of safety
high.body: You create trust and psychological safety. That lifts everyone around you.
high.cta: Name and savor this strength today.

low.title: Play is self‑care
low.body: Responsibilities can mute curiosity. Brief play boosts creativity and ease without demanding time.
low.cta: Take a five‑minute play break today.

mid.title: Curiosity on purpose
mid.body: You feel the spark of learning and ideas. Make it a practice by giving curiosity a regular time and place.

high.title: Spirit of discovery
high.body: You see possibilities everywhere. Sharing discoveries invites others to explore too.
high.cta: Share one delightful find with someone.

low.title: Intrinsic drive
low.body: You enjoy mastery and teamwork more than trophies. That’s a steady, sustainable form of ambition.

mid.title: Aim with purpose
mid.body: You strive without letting results define you. Purpose turns effort into meaning.
mid.cta: Name the value this week’s work serves.

high.title: Drive with a legacy
high.body: Your fire is powerful. It’s most fulfilling when aimed at something larger than winning.
high.cta: Journal: Which value should your drive serve?

low.title: Energy first
low.body: Vitality isn’t a reward after work; it’s the foundation for everything else.
low.cta: Take three slow breaths; relax your shoulders.

mid.title: Kind rhythms
mid.body: You know what helps you feel good. Consistency grows from self‑compassion, not perfection.

high.title: Honor your basecamp
high.body: You protect sleep, nourishment, and calm. That quiet leadership lifts your circles.
high.cta: Thank your body for its strength.

low.title: Arrive through the senses
low.body: Engaging sight, sound, taste and touch helps you land in the present, where joy lives.

mid.title: Design for savoring
mid.body: You appreciate beauty. Seeking it on purpose turns days from functional to felt.

high.title: Share your richness
high.body: You experience the world vividly. Pointing out small beauty helps others feel alive too.
high.cta: Show someone one tiny moment of beauty.
